name: Save Your Copter
description:
Synopsis

Your militaries are on a mission to ease tensions in Robotown, where a rebellion started. Some robots are turning on you and start a fight. One of your helicopter is broken and you need to wait for backup. Give orders to your soldiers to defend your positions against ennemies.

How to play

You can decide witch unit will defend witch position. Press first the key of the wanted unit, then the key of the map marker. For example, if you want to send two bazookas to the point "M", press "ZZM".

The keys are the following :
A Select a Soldier Z Select a Bazooka E Select a Sniper Space Deselect all units Enter (For the tutorial, use the Enter of your numpad) Skip the dialog YUIOPJKLMBN (All thoses key are written on the screen) Send selected unit to a position.

The Soldiers only attack the center of the selected group. They do not really aim. Take the sniper if you want to kill the remainings of a group!

Tools
Unity (the 3D Engine) Gimp Cubase
Issues
(Not tested) The bazooka may not damage enemies.

All the listed bugs will be fixed after the end of the vote phase of the jam.
